mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM AS NO, T.* FROM (SELECT USER_ID AS USERID, USER_NAME AS USERNAME, EMAIL AS EMAIL, PHONE AS PHONE, DEPARTMENT AS DEPART, USER_GROUP_ID AS USERGROUP, LANGUAGE_TYPE AS LANGTYPE, USE_YN AS USE FROM ADM_USER_INFO ORDER BY USER_ID) T
SELECT USER_ID as userId FROM ADM_USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = 'IBS' AND PASSWORD = 'IBS'
SELECT USER_ID as USERID ,USER_ID || ':' || (SELECT TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') FROM DUAL) as ACCESSTOKEN FROM ADM_USER_INFO WHERE TOKEN = #{accessToken}
